name: Absorption
description: Grants 25% Mana Shield for 20s. Grants 100% Mana Shield when Channeling.

name: Burning Ember
description: Shoots a small Burning projectile. Shoots a larger Burning ball of fire, dealing Damage in a small area.

heavyCast.description: Shoots a larger Burning ball of fire, dealing Damage in a small area.

name: Caustic Wrath
description: Shoots a large Poison projectile. Shoots a massive Poison glob, dealing Damage in a small area.

heavyCast.description: Shoots a massive Poison glob, dealing Damage in a small area.

name: Fire Rune
description: Create a small Rune, which explodes with a Burning fire after a short delay when there is an enemy nearby. Create a large Rune, which bursts into a Burning whirlwind after a long delay when there is an enemy nearby, dealing its Damage over 6s.

lightCast.description: Create a small Rune, which explodes with a Burning fire after a short delay when there is an enemy nearby.

heavyCast.description: Create a large Rune, which bursts into a Burning whirlwind after a long delay when there is an enemy nearby, dealing its Damage over 6s.

name: Hailstone
description: Shoots a small Chilling projectile. Shoots a larger chunk of Chilling ice.

heavyCast.description: Shoots a larger chunk of Chilling ice.

name: Merlin's Thorn
description: Shoots a single homing projectile. Gradually generates up to 7 weaker projectiles and shoots all of them in quick succession upon release.

heavyCast.description: Gradually generates up to 7 weaker projectiles and shoots all of them in quick succession upon release.

name: Nature's Caress
description: Heals you instantly. Slowly heals you over time. Prolonged Channeling increases healing by up to 150% over 4s.

heavyCast.description: Slowly heals you over time. Prolonged Channeling increases healing by up to 150% over 4s.

name: Prism Of The Maelstrom
description: Charged by dealing Elemental Damage 0/500. Creates an explosion, dealing 150 Damage and applying random elemental statuses to all enemies around you.

name: Rumpolt's Revenge
description: Condensates cheese from your own blood into a solid state in front of you. Slowly turns the target into cheese.

lightCast.description: Condensates cheese from your own blood into a solid state in front of you.

heavyCast.description: Slowly turns the target into cheese.

name: Sea Bite
description: Orders your summoned tadpoles to attack a specific target. Summons a tadpole to fight by your side.

lightCast.description: Orders your summoned tadpoles to attack a specific target.

heavyCast.description: Summons a tadpole to fight by your side.

name: Stone Skin
description: Creates a barrier, that negates 35% of incoming Damage for 30 seconds.

lightCast.description: Creates a barrier, that negates 35% of incoming Damage for 30 seconds.

name: Summon Grindylow
description: Orders your summons to attack a specific target. Summons a grindylow to fight by your side.

lightCast.description: Orders your summons to attack a specific target.

heavyCast.description: Summons a grindylow to fight by your side.

name: The Hollow Reprieve
description: Charged by dealing Critical Hits 0/30. Reduces Incoming Damage by half of your Critical Chance for 30s.

name: The Wailing Gale
description: Charged by killing 0/10. Summon a Tornado, which sucks up everyone within a 5m radius.

name: Toxic Dart
description: Shoots a medium Poison projectile. Shoots a great Poison glob, dealing Damage in a small area.

heavyCast.description: Shoots a great Poison glob, dealing Damage in a small area.

name: Winter's Crone's Wrath
description: Shoots a spread of 5 Chilling projectiles. Shoots a spread of 5 Chilling projectiles, increasing accuracy with longer charging time. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.

lightCast.description: Shoots a spread of 5 Chilling projectiles.

heavyCast.description: Shoots a spread of 5 Chilling projectiles, increasing accuracy with longer charging time. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.
